name: tech-radar
description: Generator for Extenda Retail Technology Radar

scripts.package: npm run clean && node bin/package.js && npm run docker:build
scripts.release: git tag v$npm_package_version && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch
scripts.postrelease: git add package.json package-lock.json && sh bin/git-commit-version.sh && git push --follow-tags
scripts.version:major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && sh bin/git-commit-version.sh && git push
scripts.version:minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && sh bin/git-commit-version.sh && git push

author: Samuel Sjoberg
